description.en:
About Razer Gold

Razer Gold is a unified virtual credit system for gamers worldwide. Use it to purchase games, in-game content, and more from thousands of games and entertainment partners across the globe.

Features

  • Instant delivery via email
  • No expiry date
  • Works with thousands of games
  • Earn Razer Silver rewards
  • Secure and trusted payment
description.zh:
关于 Razer Gold

Razer Gold 是全球玩家统一的虚拟信用系统。使用它可以在全球数千个游戏和娱乐合作伙伴处购买游戏、游戏内内容等。

特点

  • 电子邮件即时交付
  • 永不过期
  • 支持数千款游戏
  • 赚取 Razer Silver 奖励
  • 安全可信的支付

shortDescription.en: Universal gaming wallet for thousands of games worldwide. Instant delivery, no expiry.
shortDescription.zh: 全球数千款游戏通用的游戏钱包。即时交付，永不过期。

usageGuide.en:
1. Go to gold.razer.com
  2. Log in to your Razer account
  3. Click on 'Reload' and enter your PIN code
  4. Your Razer Gold balance will be credited instantly
  5. Use your balance at any supported game or store

Important: PIN codes are case-sensitive and cannot be refunded once redeemed.
usageGuide.zh:
1. 访问 gold.razer.com
  2. 登录您的 Razer 账户
  3. 点击充值并输入您的 PIN 码
  4. 您的 Razer Gold 余额将立即到账
  5. 在任何支持的游戏或商店使用您的余额

重要提示：PIN 码区分大小写，兑换后无法退款。
